Government Rates

Government Rates
short_desc: The Cosmopolitan Hotel - Tribeca offers the Government per Diem and is FEMA approved. Now that summer is here, enjoy an additional $20.00 Starbucks card with your direct booking.
long_desc:
The Cosmopolitan Hotel - Tribeca offers the Government per Diem, is FEMA approved and is located within the New York City downtown Courthouse and Federal Building district. We welcome the Government Traveler.

Starbucks card terms & conditions

  • One card per room/per stay
  • Book for stays now through September 4, 2017
  • Applies to bookings made through our website only
page_title: TriBeCa Hotel Deals | Cosmopolitan Hotel TriBeCa
meta_content: Make the most of your stay with one of our rewarding Tribeca hotel deals. Embrace easy business travel or a romantic date night with our downtown NYC hotel deals.
